data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Bologna needs to be cautious. Fiorentina have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 4, Can Fiorentina capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bologna's half?
In Florence a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Florence Fiorentina drive forward through Erick Pulgar. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 6, In Florence Fiorentina attack through Rachid Ghezzal. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Florence.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 8, Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a throw-in for Fiorentina, close to Bologna's area.
In the minute 10, Goal kick for Bologna at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο.
Bologna pushes forward through Nicolas Dominguez, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 12, Corner awarded to Bologna.
Ball safe as Fiorentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 13, Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Bologna.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο awards Bologna a goal kick.
Throw-in for Fiorentina close to the penalty box.
In the minute 15, Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Bologna's Nicola Sansone gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
In the minute 17, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Throw-in Fiorentina.
Free kick Bologna.
In Florence, Nicola Sansone of Bologna is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Bologna to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bologna's half?
In the minute 23, Federico Chiesa of Fiorentina smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Fiorentina's Patrick Cutrone breaks free at Stadio Artemio Franchi. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Bologna have a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
Rachid Ghezzal for Fiorentina gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Bologna have a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο.
Ball goes out of play for a Bologna goal kick.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 29, Rachid Ghezzal for Fiorentina has been booked by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Bologna drive upfield and Nicola Sansone gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fiorentina defender.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Bologna in the half of Fiorentina.
Bologna drives forward and Musa Barrow gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Bologna in the half of Fiorentina.
Bologna are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 36, Bologna are pushing forward but Riccardo Orsolini's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Florence.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
Bologna's Roberto Soriano has run offside.
Fiorentina's Lorenzo Venuti breaks free at Stadio Artemio Franchi. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 44, Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο awards Bologna a goal kick.
Goal kick for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Florence.
In the minute 45, Fiorentina have a goal kick.
Nicolas Dominguez for Bologna gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Florence.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Federico Chiesa gets his shot on target but fails to score for Fiorentina.
In the minute 48, Goal! Fiorentina have got their heads in front thanks to a Federico Chiesa strike.
Great play from Dalbert to set up the goal.
Patrick Cutrone for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 52, Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Bologna's half.
Fiorentina's Federico Chiesa is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 54, Goal! Fiorentina extend their lead to 2-0 through Federico Chiesa.
Giuseppe Iachini (Fiorentina) is making a first substitution, with Alfred Duncan replacing Rachid Ghezzal.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 56, Goal kick for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
Free kick Bologna.
In the minute 59, Bologna's Nicolas Dominguez is whistled for offside at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Throw-in for Bologna in the half of Fiorentina.
Nicola Sansone (Bologna) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Bologna.
In Florence, Stefano Denswil (Bologna) misses the target with a header.
Fiorentina have a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Bologna at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο.
Bologna have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 63, Sinisa Mihajlovic is making the team's first substitution at Stadio Artemio Franchi with Jerdy Schouten replacing Gary Medel.
The away team have replaced Nicolas Dominguez with Mattias Svanberg. This is the second substitution made today by Sinisa Mihajlovic.
Andri Fannar Baldursson is replacing Roberto Soriano for the away team.
In the minute 64, Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a Bologna throw-in in Fiorentina's half.
Fiorentina to take a throw-in in Bologna territory.
Riccardo Orsolini (Bologna) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 66, Riccardo Orsolini for Bologna is whistled offside.
The home team replace Lorenzo Venuti with Pol Lirola.
Christian Kouame is replacing Patrick Cutrone for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
In the minute 68, In Florence a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in high up the field for Bologna in Florence.
Can Bologna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fiorentina's half?
In the minute 73, Fiorentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Fiorentina.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Goal! Nikola Milenkovic extends Fiorentina's lead to 3-0.
German Pezzella instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 75, Musa Juwara is on a sub for Riccardo Orsolini for Bologna.
Fiorentina's Alfred Duncan misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Bologna at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Bologna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
German Pezzella (Fiorentina) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 80, Gabriele Corbo (Bologna) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 81, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Bologna close to the penalty box.
At Stadio Artemio Franchi, Dalbert has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο.
In the minute 83, Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο blows against Bologna's Ibrahima Mbaye for offside.
Throw-in for Bologna close to the penalty box.
Bologna make their fifth substitution with Federico Bonini replacing Danilo.
In the minute 84, Aleksa Terzic is replacing Dalbert for the home team.
Federico Brancolini is replacing Pietro Terracciano for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Can Bologna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fiorentina's half?
In the minute 86, Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
Bologna to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 88, Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
It's now 4-0 in Florence as Federico Chiesa scores for Fiorentina.
That's a fine assist from Christian Kouame.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Florence.
Free kick for Bologna in the half of Fiorentina.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 4-0.
